attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: IF YOU ARE SEEING THIS DONT GET THIS APP! Not only did it take so long to download. I got a notification from the app saying they would take away all my food if I didn’t vote for him! And I can’t! I can’t vote yet because I’m not of legal age. So they took my food it’s been weeks, no MONTHS! Without eating the fact I made it this far is such a miracle. Please if you care for your food and safety don’t get this app. It should be DELETED 🧚‍♀️💕🙌🏽 LIKE ITS A THREAT TO US AND IM SCARED FOR MY SAFTY!!! I got a text from Congress saying that if I can’t throw it back I’ll get deported. And I can’t! I don’t have the facilities for that! Guess I’m going back to Mexico 😔 🇲🇽

attributes.title: Bad experience
attributes.review: I wanted to support our local Cheeto puff corn flavored by downloading this app thinking maybe this’ll be good but as soon as  I downloaded it 5 oompah loompa’s came to my door saying they have orders from their leader to take me to him later on I discover it’s Donald Duck oh I’m sorry I mean Donald Trump and they captured me and started pouring spaghetti sauce on me trying to give me a tan apparently that’s how Donald does it and they trapped me in the basement of his golden hotel I’m still here little do they know I still have my phone! So I’m warning you DON’T install this app or you’ll have the worse experience in your life!😡😭

attributes.title: Make America great again..
attributes.review: Why does this app need my phone number?? I find that very suspicious and quite uncomfortable. Why would an app need my phone? Are y’all gonna send bots to call? No way.. it’s not happening on my watch. I don’t just give my phone number to random strangers or apps Im not familiar with. Does trump think I’m stupid?? I’m very cautious of giving out my personal info on this app, it’s very sketchy. I shouldn’t be forced to give my number to a random app. I’ve seen a lot of reviews of how much this app glitches and hacks and I’d say that I can 100% guarantee this app should be taken down

attributes.title: You use spray tan so you can have color because you’re white
attributes.review: He belongs in a slaves place. By the way I am black so don’t come for me. Next thing I want to talk about is I hope him a happy Anniversary for being stupid and I hope you die. By the way I sent lovely peaches towards you. And she said that she was going to break inside the White House. It will now be called the black house because you like to be racist. And I’m gonna tell everyone your little secrets. George Washington the first president was actually black. Beethoven the instrument guy was actually black. And the guy who made peanut butter was actually black.

attributes.title: So disappointed 😡
attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes to support our president and instead I find a Cheeto saying very inappropriate things and have viewed other reviews where he asked other teenagers for their phone numbers when using the app and I find that very disrespectful 😡I am very very mad and it is a shame that all of the glitches going on have ruined what I thought would be a marvelous app😤 all of the hours it took to download were not worth it and I hoped that I could have taken this seriously and would see our president but instead has a bunker biatch with a fake tan 🤬🤬

attributes.title: If you downloaded this app no you didn’t ❤️
attributes.review: First of all I’m not sure why this app took 7 weeks to download? Kind of disappointing because I was really looking forward to supporting my very smart and cool and handsome president who I love so incredibly much. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP I CANNOT STRESS THIS ENOUGH!!! I fell asleep while I was waiting for it to load, and Mike Pence somehow manifested himself into my dreams and called me ugly :/ I’m not sure why he wasted a manifestation on something so cruel 😔 It finally downloaded at 4am but by then I didn’t even want it anymore. Anyways stream four by one direction and don’t forget to vote niall horan for president ✨

attributes.title: 👎stupid and stinky👎
attributes.review: I 👁 was browsing the App Store 😎👍 while taking a big boy poop-pee 💩😌 when ✨𝓢𝓾𝓭𝓭𝓮𝓷𝓵𝔂✨ a maga hat 🔴🧢🤢descended down from the heavens 🌤✝️, landed on my head 🤕, and 👻 𝓹𝓸𝓼𝓼𝓮𝓼𝓼𝓮𝓭 👻 me. It took control 🤡👹 of my body and forced me to download this app 🆘⁉️ I cried out “ 𝓰𝓸𝓸𝓭 𝓖𝓸𝓭 𝔀𝓱𝔂 𝓶𝓮?!” To which a phantom 🔮 Cheeto 🥕 appeared in the mirror before me. It spoke:✨ “ 𝔒𝔲𝔯 𝔭𝔯𝔢𝔰𝔦𝔡𝔢𝔫𝔱 𝔞𝔫𝔡 𝔥𝔦𝔰 𝔰𝔠𝔯𝔲𝔪𝔭𝔱𝔦𝔬𝔲𝔰 𝔡𝔲𝔪𝔭 𝔱𝔯𝔲𝔠𝔨 𝔞𝔰𝔰 𝔞𝔯𝔢 𝔰𝔠𝔞𝔯𝔢𝔡 𝔞𝔫𝔡 𝔴𝔢 𝔫𝔢𝔢𝔡 𝔞𝔩𝔩 𝔱𝔥𝔢 𝔥𝔢𝔩𝔭 𝔴𝔢 𝔠𝔞𝔫 𝔤𝔢𝔱.”✨In my shock and horror I found that the app performed poorly, crashed often, and was full of fascist propaganda, racism, bigotry, and someone gross who calls himself the “POTUS”. 0/10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review:
If I could give it zero star I would but this app took me 1 year to download and when it download I opened the app when then I saw a lot of photos of Trump and I was extremely terrified and I had a lot of nightmares and I was like “mommy I am sacred” but  I told Cardi “I want to go to Pluto” and she did take me to Pluto so i can forget the nightmares so then I deleted the app 
so plz don’t download this horrible app if you don’t want nightmares 😤😡

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
When I click on this app, my phone then begins to glitch out for some reason. Because this only happens with this app, I believe Donald, not to be confused for the famous world-know celebrity sailor, Donald Duck,may be stealing our information by hacking into our devices. 
 This makes me question if I even would like to vote for him any longer. I am now thinking of switching to the Democratic party and voting for the more intelligent substitute, Joe Biden. 
  If you are a Trump supporter thinking about downloading this, I suggest you do not. Your information may be stolen by Donald and sold to lord knows where. Stay safe.

attributes.title: CHINA😫😫🤬🤬
attributes.review: Thought this app was a good platform until I started getting calls in chinese every day trying to steal my credit card information and social security number. I’ve already had to cancel 5 credit cards because of someone making purchases with it and switch banks 3 times. THIS IS OUTRAGEOUS!!! Trump is working with the CHINESE GOVERMENT to leak our information. I’ve had to go off the grid and move into a bunker so that people can no longer reach me or steal my information. I am APPALLED!!!! I will NOT be voting for trump this coming fall. No president should leak our information to other countries😤😤😤
